page.title: 06Mrs. BRECHIN of HANWELL
page.content: Mrs. Brechin gets up at about eight o'clock. Shambles,the dog from upstairs,comes down to see her.Mrs. Brechin lives on her own, but her family lives up-stairs. They visit her often. She usually goes shopping every day but her big shop is on Saturday. She likes reading and writing. She has her own small garden which she likes to take care of on her own. These hobbies take up most of her time. She has lived in Hanwell for seven years and she likes where she lives because it's near the town yet free and open. She travels out of Hanwell about once a year. She doesn't go to church. Her most memorable time in Hanwell was her eightieth birthday which was last year. Anna and Katy Derbyshire
